summary: The strongest Mace you can craft!
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever dreamed of an Weapon, that can destroy all your enemies?
A weapon that makes the people feel a kind of fear, they never felt before?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can craft the mace in each forge. you must have the steel smithing perk.
You need 3 steelingots, 3 ironingots and 4 leatherstrips.
steel-category
